Title: Sets requirements for the sale, lease, and rental of powered bicycles, powered mobility devices, and storage batteries for such devices
Summary: Sets requirements for the sale, lease, and rental of powered bicycles, powered mobility devices, and storage batteries for such devices; provides for penalties for the violation thereof.
LawCode: Add ยง391-ee, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the sale, lease, and rental of powered bicycles, powered mobility devices, and storage batteries for such devices
